title: BRIEF-India's IIFL Wealth Management Reports Fall in Sept-Qtr Consol Profit
text:
BRIEF-India's IIFL Wealth Management Reports Fall in Sept-Qtr Consol Profit

Stock Markets 30 minutes ago (Oct 21, 2019 20:12)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's IIFL Wealth Management Reports Fall in Sept-Qtr Consol Profit Oct 21 (Reuters) - IIFL Wealth Management Ltd IIFW.NS : * SEPT QUARTER PROFIT 684.2 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS 1.01 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO * SEPT QUARTER CONSOL TOTAL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 3.69 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 4.26 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO * IIFL WEALTH MANAGEMENT LTD SAYS BOARD HAS DECLARED AN INTERIM DIVIDEND OF 10 RUPEES PER EQUITY SHARES

BRIEF-India's IIFL Wealth Management Reports Fall in Sept-Qtr Consol Profit
description: BRIEF-India's IIFL Wealth Management Reports Fall in Sept-Qtr Consol Profit
